snippet: Two gunmen on a motorcycle shot and wounded an outspoken police commander, the third such attack on a female officer since July, the authorities said.
abstract: Afghan authorities say that outspoken female police commander, identified as Second Lt Nigara, has been shot and wounded by two gunmen in southern Helmand Province, third such attack on a female officer since July.

byline.original: By ROD NORDLAND and TAIMOOR SHAH
byline.contributor: Alissa J. Rubin contributed reporting from Paris.

lead_paragraph: Two gunmen on a motorcycle shot and wounded an outspoken police commander, the third such attack on a female officer since July, the authorities said.

headline.main: Female Afghan Police Commander Is Shot
headline.print_headline: Female Afghan Police Commander Is Shot
